issue.title: Cant decrease gazebo main window height

content.raw:
A solution to bring the minimum height of the Gazebo windows (and thus rendering Gazebo useful on laptop screens) is available in this commit https://bitbucket.org/traversaro/gazebo-fork/commits/d577d3ce27723f3b0db86946c944a1b412266d62?at=fixWindowMinSize , with an associated regression test. 

Let me know if it make sense to open a PR against default of agaist gazebo5 and then merge forward. 

The trick used to reduce the minimum height was to move the Stairs button to be on the same row of the Window/Door buttons : 
![newBuildingEditor.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3851904788-newBuildingEditor.png)

The height that I obtain with this modification on my machine is 703 pixel.
